titleStmt.title: Greek inscription in elegiac distichs honouring the praet. prefect or the vicarius Aphthonius from Gortyna (Crete) by (the consularis ?) Aristides

msIdentifier.repository: element was left where it was found

layout.p: One epigraphic field. It lies on the convex surface of the columnar base (c. 42,8 x 40 cm.). Lines 2, 4, 6, 8 lines are indented on the left alignment.

handNote.term: lunate elongated letters, with traces of rubrication

origPlace.placeName: public space, probably in front of the Praetorium of Gortyna

history.provenance: beneath the porch of the building opposite the entrance to the Praetorium of Gortyna from the North Street (see inscr. l. 1)

div.ab:
1-2 Verse 1 Ἀντίον ἀχράντοιο Δίκης | τὸν ἄχραντον ὕπαρχον |
3-4 Verse 2 δῖος Ἀριστείδης | ἵδρυσεν Ἀφθόνιον, |
5-6 Verse 3 πειθόμενος ψήφῳ λογάδων | καὶ δόγματι βουλῆς, |
7-8 verse 4 πολλῶν ἀντ’ ἀγαθῶν | μικρὰ χαριζόμενος.

div.p: “In the face of pure Justice the illustrious Aristeides erected (the statue of) the pure hyparchos Aphthonios, fulfilling the vow of the notables and the decision of the city-council, rewarding with a small gratitude in exchange for so many meritorious achievements”.

“Face à la Justice pure, l’illustre Aristéide a érigé (la statue de) l’hyparchos le pur Aphthonios, accomplissant le vœu des notables et la décision de la curie, lui rendant par une petite gratitude tant de mérites”.

“Di fronte alla pura Giustizia l’illustre Aristeides ha eretto (la statua del) puro hyparchos Aphthonios, adempiendo al voto dei notabili e alla decisione della curia, rendendo ben poca riconoscenza a fronte di tante benemerenze”.
